docblock.description: High level object oriented filesystem abstraction.
The TOUCH event occurs after File::touch() was called.
docblock.long-description: This event allows you to act after touching a file. The event listener method receives a Filicious\Event\TouchEvent instance.

docblock.description: The SET_OWNER event occurs after File::setOwner() was called.
docblock.long-description: This event allows you to act after changing the owner of a file. The event listener method receives a Filicious\Event\SetOwnerEvent instance.

docblock.description: The SET_GROUP event occurs after File::setGroup() was called.
docblock.long-description: This event allows you to act after changing the group of a file. The event listener method receives a Filicious\Event\SetOwnerEvent instance.

docblock.description: The SET_MODE event occurs after File::setMode() was called.
docblock.long-description: This event allows you to act after changing the group of a file. The event listener method receives a Filicious\Event\SetModeEvent instance.

docblock.description: The DELETE event occurs before File::delete() was called.
docblock.long-description: This event allows you to act before deleting a file. The event listener method receives a Filicious\Event\DeleteEvent instance.

docblock.description: The DELETE event occurs after File::delete() was called.
docblock.long-description: This event allows you to act after deleting a file. The event listener method receives a Filicious\Event\DeleteEvent instance.

docblock.description: The COPY event occurs after File::copy() was called.
docblock.long-description: This event allows you to act after copying a file. The event listener method receives a Filicious\Event\CopyEvent instance.

docblock.description: The MOVE event occurs after File::move() was called.
docblock.long-description: This event allows you to act after moving a file. The event listener method receives a Filicious\Event\MoveEvent instance.

docblock.description: The CREATE_DIRECTORY event occurs after File::createDirectory() was called.
docblock.long-description: This event allows you to act after a directory was created. The event listener method receives a Filicious\Event\CreateDirectoryEvent instance.

docblock.description: The CREATE_FILE event occurs after File::createFile() was called.
docblock.long-description: This event allows you to act after an empty file was created. The event listener method receives a Filicious\Event\CreateFileEvent instance.

docblock.description: The WRITE event occurs after File::setContents() was called.
docblock.long-description: This event allows you to act after a file was overwritten. The event listener method receives a Filicious\Event\WriteEvent instance.

docblock.description: The APPEND event occurs after File::appendContents() was called.
docblock.long-description: This event allows you to act after a file was appended. The event listener method receives a Filicious\Event\AppendEvent instance.

docblock.description: The TRUNCATE event occurs after File::truncate() was called.
docblock.long-description: This event allows you to act after a file was truncated. The event listener method receives a Filicious\Event\TruncateEvent instance.

High level object oriented filesystem abstraction.

tag.name: var
tag.description: Flag for file operations, which involve a file target destination, indicating that missing parent directories of the operations file target destination should be created before the execution of the operation is done

tag.name: var
tag.description: Flag for file operations to apply the execution recrusivly, if the file being operated on is a directory.

tag.name: var
tag.description: Flag for file operations, which involve a file target destination, to reject the execution of the operation, if the operations file target destination already exists. This flag overrules the OPERATION_REPLACE flag.

tag.name: var
tag.description: Flag for file operations, which involve a file target destination, to merge the operations file source with the operations file target destination.

tag.name: var
tag.description: Flag for file operations, which involve a file target destination, to replace the target destination.

docblock.description: List everything (LIST_HIDDEN | LIST_VISIBLE | LIST_FILES | LIST_DIRECTORIES | LIST_LINKS | LIST_OPAQUE)
Get the filesystem this file belongs to.
Returns the full abstracted pathname of this file within the containing filesystem.
docblock.long-description: A pathname always starts with a forward slash and never ends with one. The exception is the root of the filesystem, which returns the empty string.

docblock.description: Returns the basename of this file, which is the string after the last forward slash of the pathname of this file.
docblock.long-description: If the basename ends with the given suffix, it will be truncated off of the end of the basename.

docblock.description: Return the extension of the filename.
docblock.long-description: May return an empty string, if filename has no extension.

docblock.description: Return the dirname or parent name.

docblock.long-description: May return null if called on the root "/" node.

tag.description: True if the file exists and is a file; otherwise false

docblock.description: Set the date and time at which the file was modified and / or accessed last time.
docblock.long-description: The given $time and $atime parameters are converted to \DateTime objects via Util::createDateTime, with the one exception, that if $atime parameter is set to null, then the date and time given in the $time parameter will be used for $atime.
